name: Wanderer (DreamGuru)
description:
Unity Project for Grads in Games 2020

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story

You are traveling back through the great tree on the way home to see your family when you hear a lost voice calling out to you. Sounds like something went wrong do you go and help?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Movement - wasd

Look - Mouse

Interact - E

Item main use - Left Click

Item secondary use - Right Click

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Downloaded Assets : Fonts from 1001 free fonts - Free for commercial use Music - Paid bundle FX - FreeSound.org - All Creative Commons 0 Plugins : Shader Graph Universal Render Pipeline
